sentences: Chihaya Yoshitake (吉武 千颯, Yoshitake Chihaya, born 28 March 1999) is a Japanese singer and voice actress affiliated with  Apollo Bay.
Chihaya Yoshitake was born on 28 March 1999 in Hiroshima Prefecture.
In 2017, She was the winner of the 2017 Anisong Stars Jury Special Award.
In October 2018, she was selected as one of eight members of the "Voitama Project", and in 2019 started her activities in web content.
